Get infomation on someones phone number: â€‹

Phoneinfogaâ­ â€‹

This is the best tool to find out infomation about phone numbers. This tool is available for Windows, Linux and MacOS.

Find people across social media via there username: â€‹

Sherlock â­ â€‹

Sherlock is a command line tool that can search over 50 social media services.

DDoS / DoS Tools â€‹

1. MHDDoS â­ â€‹

An excellent DDoS / DoS tool. One of the best ones in my opinion.

2. LOIC â€‹

A decent DoS / DDoS tool that is easy to use and install. Note: This rogram doesn't have malware, it is just flagged as malware because it's a DDoS / DoS tool.

3. XOIC â€‹

Similar to LOIC.

4. Slowloris â€‹

A good DDoS / DoS tool.
